com.wit.android.widget.adapter

Class BaseMultiAdapter<Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.internal.BaseWidgetAdapter
        • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
          • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseMultiAdapter<Adapter>
  • Type Parameters:
    Adapter - Type of the adapter which extends this base multi-module adapter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter, IMultiAdapter<Adapter>, AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter

    public abstract class BaseMultiAdapter<Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>
extends BaseAdapter
implements IMultiAdapter<Adapter>, AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        protected void onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle savedState)
        Description copied from class: BaseWidgetAdapter

        Invoked to restore state of this adapter instance. Note, that this is invoked only in case that the bundle passed to BaseWidgetAdapter.dispatchRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle) is valid.

        Overrides:
        onRestoreInstanceState in class BaseWidgetAdapter
        Parameters:
        savedState - Bundle with saved data populated in BaseWidgetAdapter.onSaveInstanceState(Bundle). Always valid bundle.
